scripts.mongo:volume: docker run --name mongo-db --rm --network goals-net -v goals-data:/data/db mongo
scripts.mongo:volume:auth: docker run --name mongo-db --rm --network goals-net -v goals-data:/data/db -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=saket -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=secret mongo
scripts.node:container-final: docker run --name goals-backend -v "%cd%":/app -v logs:/app/logs -v /app/node_modules --env-file=./.env -p 80:80 --network goals-net --rm goals-node
